name: Wat Phra That Doi Suthep
description: Iconic hilltop temple with city views.

name: Chiang Mai Night Bazaar
description: Famous night market with souvenirs, food, and handicrafts.

name: Doi Inthanon National Park
description: Thailand's highest peak with waterfalls and trails.

name: Chiang Mai Zoo
description: Large zoo with a panda house and aquarium.

name: Chiang Mai Old City
description: Walled and moated area with temples and cafes.

name: Wat Chedi Luang
description: Historic temple with a partially ruined Lanna-style chedi.

name: Wat Phra Singh
description: 14th-century temple known for classic Lanna architecture.

name: Elephant Nature Park
description: Rescue and rehabilitation center for elephants.

name: Bua Thong Waterfalls (Sticky Waterfalls)
description: Unique limestone waterfall you can climb.

name: Art in Paradise Chiang Mai
description: Interactive 3D art museum for fun photos.

name: Chiang Mai Night Safari
description: Nocturnal zoo with tram rides and animal shows.

name: Royal Park Rajapruek
description: Beautiful gardens and Thai architecture.

name: Nimmanhaemin Road
description: Trendy street with cafes, boutiques, and galleries.

name: Wat Umong
description: Forest temple with tunnels and ancient chedi.

name: Tha Phae Gate
description: Main eastern gate of the old city and tourist hub.

name: Chiang Mai National Museum
description: Museum about northern Thai culture and history.

name: Huay Tung Tao Lake
description: Leisure area with lakeside huts and mountain views.

name: Mae Sa Elephant Camp
description: Elephant shows and rides in natural setting.

name: Queen Sirikit Botanic Garden
description: Large garden with canopy walks and greenhouses.

name: Mon Cham
description: Mountain viewpoint with flower fields and camping.
